Type.Name: IRequiresSessionState
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: Implement the interface in your custom HTTP handler to identify that your handler requires read and write access to session-state values.

summary.para: Specifies that the target HTTP handler requires read and write access to session-state values. This is a marker interface and has no methods.
